projects.title: Next Play
projects.description: Is an aesthetically pleasing and responsive web music application built using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Spotify, and the Unsplash API.

projects.title: Viva Film
projects.description: Viva Film is a web project that showcases a film community platform, highlighting film examples, cameras and lenses.

projects.title: Next Retro Game
projects.description: Compilation of stunning 3D retro-themed images crafted using Blender and Aframe, seamlessly integrated into the Next.js web development framework.
